name: 周仁祥
objective: Electrical engineering is composed of wide range of fields including, power systems, power electronics, control systems, computer systems, and communication systems. This course is help students acquire these principles and applications focusing in the fields mentioned above. The quizzes will be held without notification. To participate lecture every time is encouraged  by grading systems. The small project with electrical circuit will be added in this course.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction 
Week 2 Introduction, Circuit Analysis 1
Week 3 Circuit Analysis 2
Week 4 Inductance and Capacitance 1
Week 5 National Holiday
Week 6 Inductance and Capacitance 2 
Week 7 Transient Analysis 1
Week 8 Transient Analysis 2
Week 9 Midterm Exam.
Week 10 AC Steady State Analysis 1
Week 11 AC Steady State Analysis 2
Week 12 AC Steady State Analysis 3
Week 13 Frequency Analysis 1
Week 14 Frequency Analysis 2
Week 15 Frequency Analysis 3
Week 16 Bode Diagram 1
Week 17 Bode Diagram 2
Week 18 Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
Participation(including quizzes, small project, and assignment) 40%
Midterm Exam. 30%
Final Exam. 30%
Remark: All materials will be taught in English.
materials:
1.Electrical Engineering Principles and Applications 
Seventh Edition, by Hambley, Person (required)
2.Fundamental of Electric Circuits
Sixth  Edition, by Alexander/Sadiku, McGraw-Hill (optional)
